extendedInfo.description: LoL Calc Lite gives all League of Legends fanatics a comprehensive database of champions and items right in your pocket for offline enjoyment.You can view and study your favorite champions. Search and filter through the list of items to find your optimal build order.

reviews.title: A calc app without a calc
reviews.comment: Layout is great but all images a really outdated and its call lol calc lite but does not have a calc in it lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Searched for dethcap to see if it gave 155 or 140 AP, it wasn\'t even included. Very outdated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great apps.. better nerf irelia... p.s, it FCed... sent a report... experia ray...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a work of art in the making.... All LoL fans will find this very useful in the future...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No calculator after months of checking for updates? Crashed champions page? Uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Be nice if calc worked.. or even had new champs like rene cass or cat
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs to be updated to current game patches, items, and champions. It looks like an abandoned app. Don\'t bother.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing alot of champs
reviews.comment: Great app but needs updating. Missing rumble jarvan viktor etc. Keep yo app uptodate plssss 5 star if it was up2date
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Broken App
reviews.comment: App crashes on startup. The site LolCalc seems to be down as well. It pure and simply doesn\'t work anymore. not worth downloading and should probably be removed from the Store.
reviews.author: Joaquin Garcia

reviews.comment: Its prettty good but it could use a little more. Like full pics of the character, character skins,and what you use to create items.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be good for new players if it were updated ever, but too far behind now to be useful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Dont install...hasnt been updated since many many patches ago...everything is outdated
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: when will be more update? iphone3 better than this one
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: wasnt what i expected, wanted to put together some trial builds but it just shows stats not complete builds. xperia x10
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really cool need to get champs updated tho

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: This app only has champions from about 5-6 months ago.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I play Guild Wars Online but to my surprise this game is practically more enhanced. Very good! `Moment`

reviews.comment: All is good but champions dont working
